stories.original_headline: Ancient fingerprint found on 2,400-year-old Danish war boat
stories.original_summary: More than a century after its discovery, Scandinavia’s oldest plank boat is finally giving up new secrets. By analyzing ancient caulking and cords from the Hjortspring boat, researchers uncovered traces of pine pitch and animal fat — materials that likely came from pine-rich regions east of Denmark
stories.fantasy_headline: Ancient Mark Discovered on Age-Old Northern Longship
stories.fantasy_story: After a hundred years, the oldest plank vessel from the Frostlands has revealed a secret. Scholars divining its ancient sealing tar and woven ropes found an imprint. This mark suggests the ship's builder hailed from enchanted pine forests to the east, a touch from a bygone era.

stories.original_headline: OpenClaw founder Peter Steinberger is joining OpenAI
stories.original_summary: Sam Altman announced on X that Peter Steinberger, the man behind the trendy AI agent OpenClaw, was joining OpenAI. He said that Steinberger has "a lot of amazing ideas" about getting AI agents to interact with each other, saying "the future is going to be extremely multi-agent." He also said that th
stories.fantasy_headline: Master Artificer Joins Grand Guild, Heralding New Magical Constructs
stories.fantasy_story: Arch-Mage Samwell proclaimed a great announcement across the land: Master Peter, renowned founder of the Whispering Talons clan, has joined the Grand Enchanters' Guild. Master Peter brings incredible ideas for future magical automatons. Soon, many-minded constructs will work together, weaving powerful enchantments for all.

stories.original_headline: You need to watch the intensely surreal cult classic Possession
stories.original_summary: Let me just say that I highly recommend you go into Possession blind. Don't watch a trailer. Don't even finish reading this. Go watch it now over on Shudder, Criterion, or Metrograph. It's also available through Kanopy or Hoopla if your library provides access. Then come back so we can talk about it
stories.fantasy_headline: Seek the Fabled Dream-like Spectacle of 'The Haunting'!
stories.fantasy_story: Word spreads of a legendary tale, 'The Haunting,' a truly mind-bending spectacle. Many sages advise witnessing this performance without knowing its secrets beforehand. Find it within the Grand Scrying Pools or seek out a whispering storyteller to experience its otherworldly magic.
